entries.info: index of the track in the DC bank
entries.name: index

entries.info: track x position at detector surface (cm)
entries.name: x

entries.info: track y position at detector surface (cm)
entries.name: y

entries.info: track z position at detector surface (cm)
entries.name: z

entries.info: track unit direction vector x component at detector surface
entries.name: tx

entries.info: track unit direction vector y component at detector surface
entries.name: ty

entries.info: track unit direction vector z component at detector surface
entries.name: tz

entries.info: track x position in local coordinates (cm)
entries.name: lx

entries.info: track y position in local coordinates (cm)
entries.name: ly

entries.info: track z position in local coordinates (cm)
entries.name: lz

entries.info: DC track x position in local coordinates (cm)
entries.name: dx

entries.info: DC track y position in local coordinates (cm)
entries.name: dy

entries.info: DC track z position in local coordinates (cm)
entries.name: dz

entries.info: pathlength of the track from the track vertex to the detector surface (cm)
entries.name: path
